hero.title: Robotic Welding Stations
hero.description: RTI Robotech Innovation manufactures and supplies welding stations. Each workstation can be customized according to your requirements.

arc_seam_tracking.title: Arc Seam Tracking
arc_seam_tracking.description: Arc Seam Tracking for welding performs measurements on the welding arc and path compensation during welding. TAST tracks the weld center using oscillating motion. The welding electrode distance is measured using arc voltage measurement.

touch_sensing.title: Touch Sensing
touch_sensing.description: Touch Sensing with an electric touch sensor can detect and compensate for shifted and rotated products. Several methods can be used for finding the initial point, 2D and 3D shifts and rotations, even for circular holes.

h_series.name: H
h_series.title: H Series
h_series.description: Robotic welding station on an H-shaped steel structure. The robot is positioned in the center and serves two workstations. In one station, the robot welds, while in the other station, the operator removes the finished weldment and prepares the next one.
h_series.additionalInfo: The H robotic welding station consists of two separate workstations. Each workstation has its own start and stop controls for the work cycle and its own safety features. Additional welding wire can be fed from a coil or drum. Welding station length 3000 mm, turning diameter 1200 mm.

e_series.name: E
e_series.title: E Series
e_series.description: Robotic welding station on an E-shaped steel structure. The robot is mounted on a track, suspended on a tower, and serves two workstations. In one station, the robot welds, while in the other station, the operator removes the finished weldment and prepares the next one. Station length is 2850 mm, turning diameter 1200 mm.
e_series.additionalInfo: By easily removing the center partition, the workstations can be combined into one long 6200 mm station. The E robotic welding station consists of two separate workstations. Each workstation has its own start and stop controls for the work cycle and its own safety features. Additional welding wire can be fed from a coil or drum.

t_series.name: T
t_series.title: T Series
t_series.description: The T robotic welding station is on a steel welding table. The robot is mounted on the table. The table measures 1500 x 1000 mm with 22 mm holes for using standard welding clamps.
t_series.additionalInfo: The T robotic welding station has its own start and stop controls for the work cycle and its own safety features. Additional welding wire can be fed from a coil or drum.
